entry.title: Is trade a major driver of income inequality?
entry.summary: Our World in Data presents the empirical evidence on global development in entries dedicated to specific topics. In this blog post we cover the link between globalization and inequality. In two separate companion posts we cover the link between globalization and economic growth, and the link between globalization and jobs. These articles draw on data and research discussed in our entry on International Trade.
